title: Moment armed robber pulls out a gun in street attack...before realising his victim is a friend
text:
This is the strange moment a man attempting a robbery changes his mind at the last minute after realising his target is a friend.

The victim is waiting outside a front door on a quiet street in Argentina when two men on motorcycles approach him.

One of the men gets off and then runs towards the other man while pointing a gun at him.

One of the men gets off and then runs towards the other man while pointing a gun at him (pictured)

After a second of looking at his face he then realises that it is somebody he knows and high fives the man and hugs him (pictured)

He then tries to grab his hands and motions for him to get down on the ground.

After a second of looking at his face he then realises that it is somebody he knows and high fives the man and hugs him.

The target of the robbery looks completely unfazed by the incident and even waves the pair off after the encounter.

The man then gets back on the motorbike with his friend and accomplice and drives away.
description: After a second of looking at his face, the robber realises that it is somebody he knows and then high fives the man and hugs him. The incident happened in Argentina.
